catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 54
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: seated noble male figure at bottom, looking thoughtfully towards R, with PL hand held to chin; black hat; inscription at ULQ against white, pink, and gold background
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

ULQ: (Minamoto Shunrai Ason // Many currents branch out from / a tumbling cascade of a waterfall. / Rocks stand in the midst of waves / formed by rapid flows, / which become an eternal river.)
markings: Lower left corner of shikishi: (tiny black seal)
title: Minamoto Shunrai (or Toshiyori)
